text:"import { h, Component } from 'preact';\nimport { useState } from 'preact/hooks';\ntype TextProps = {\n  text: string;\n}\nexport default function App"
text:"<TextProps>(props: TextProps) {\n  const [count, setCount] = useState"
text:"<number>(0);\n  return (\n    "
<
identifier:"div"
>
space:"\n"
space:"      "
<
identifier:"p"
>
text:"Count: {count}"
</
identifier:"p"
>
space:"\n"
space:"      "
<
identifier:"button"
space:" "
identifier:"onClick"
=
expr:"{() => setCount(count + 1)}"
>
text:"Click me"
</
identifier:"button"
>
space:"\n"
space:"      "
<
identifier:"style"
space:" "
identifier:"scoped"
>
expr:"{`\n        p {\n          color: red;\n        }\n        button {\n          background: blue;\n        }\n      `}"
</
identifier:"style"
>
space:"\n"
space:"    "
</
identifier:"div"
>
space:"\n"
space:"  "
text:");\n}\n"
